Articles.Content:
For those who might be interested, ESA have just launched the second year of the "Space Explorations Masters" Challenge [1]. This is essentially an idea generator competition whereby you can submit you ideas to solve key problems in the space industry for a chance to have funding and collaboration opportunities with big industrial players in the sector. 

 

Seems like an interesting opportunity for any of you who might have some creative ideas lurking in the back of your mind.

 

[1] http://www.esa.int/Our_Activities/Human_Spaceflight/Be_the_next_Space_Exploration_Master
Yeah, centrepedal gravity by spinning. Inflatable space stations.
